All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Artist
Represents an artist in the art gallery.
Artwork
Represents an artist in the art gallery.
ArtworkController
Controller class for managing Artwork operations.
ArtWorkNotFoundException
Represents an exception thrown when an artwork is not found.
DBConnection
Handles the database connection for the application.
DBPropertyUtil
Utility class to fetch database properties from the configuration file.
Gallery
Represents a Gallery entity containing information about an art gallery.
GalleryDao
Interface defining operations for managing Galleries.
GalleryDaoImpl
Implementation of Gallery DAO for database operations related to galleries.
GalleryDAOImplTest
Test class for the GalleryDaoImpl methods.
IvirtualArtGallery
Interface defining operations for managing Artworks and User Favorites in a Virtual Art Gallery.
User
Represents a user in the art system.
UserController
Controller class for managing User operations.
UserDao
Interface defining operations for managing users in a data access layer.
UserDaoImpl
Interface defining operations for managing users in a data access layer.
UserNotFoundException
Represents an exception thrown when a user is not found.
VirtualArtGalleryImpl
Implementation of IVirtualArtGallery for database operations related to artwork.
VirtualArtGalleryImplTest
Test class for VirtualArtGalleryImpl methods.
VirtualArtMain
The main class representing the Virtual Art Gallery System.
